sentences: The Secretariat introduced the item (FCCC/SB/2010/INF.1 and 3-4).

SBSTA Chair Konaté reported that Bruce Wilson (Australia) and Nagmeldin Goutbi Elhassan (Sudan) had been appointed, respectively, as the Chair and Vice-Chair of the Expert Group on Technology Transfer (EGTT).
EGTT Vice-Chair Elhassan reported on the work of the EGTT, including on updating and implementing the EGTT s 2010-2011 programme of work.
Carlos Fuller (Belize) and Ronald Schillemans (the Netherlands) will Co-Chair a joint SBSTA/SBI contact group.
